doc.after: Often more than one reaction is possible given the same starting materials The reactions may differ in their stoichiometry For example the methylation of benzene C6H6 through a Friedel Crafts reaction using AlCl3 as a catalyst may produce singly methylated C6H5CH3 doubly methylated C6H4 CH3 2 or still more highly methylated C6H6 n CH3 n products as shown in the following example
